result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Response by Deft. and asks the court to follow recommendation of Competency Examination.  Court orders the State to draft order for Competency Exam.  Next hearing can be by video.

2:10 PM Prosecuting attorney Amy Pautzke court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Craig L Miller in court, in custody.  Attorney Brent DeBord present w/Defendant.  Atty. DeBord requests to be appointed as stand by counsel.  Court is in agreement.  Deft. will need to file waiver of counsel.  Requests a STC and possible Motion Hearing after Deft. and Atty. DeBord can review case instead of PH at this time and waives his time limits.. Court advises that State can communicate w/Atty. DeBord.  Defense argues bond modification.  Response by State.  Court advises that when Deft. becomes eligible for a program to request modification of bond at that time.
Status conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

RE: request for counsel to meet with defendant.

1:26 PM   Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Craig L Miller in court, in custody.  Court reviews letter Deft. wrote on July 6th.  Court questions Deft. if he should remain on case.  Deft. agrees Judge Judge to remain on case.  Court addresses Preliminary Hearing after Motion Hearing and if Deft. wants counsel.  Deft. wants counsel.  Deft. given information on SPD.  JA to contact SPD to talk w/Deft. in Oconto Co. Jail.  Response by Atty Pautzke.  The Court requests the Sheriff allow Deft. to stay in the custody of Oconto County until he meets w/counsel.  Deft. give the Waiver of Right to Attorney if he so chooses to complete.
STC scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

2:11 PM Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Craig L Miller.  Attorney Lisa Rowe in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Craig L Miller (in custody) in court .  Atty. Spansail advises court that Deft. wants him to withdraw and wants to proceed w/o counsel.  Deft. requests preliminary hearing and wants standby counsel.  Court explains stand by counsel is for jury trial only.  Deft. asks for higher cash bond and bond posted to be returned to poster.  Court amends cash bond to $10,000.00 with same conditions.   Cash bond of $2500.00 to be returned to poster.  Court allows withdrawal of Atty. Spansail (to file order to withdraw).  Deft. given forms for waiver of counsel.
